verses.name: John 8:47
verses.text: He that is of God heareth God’s words: ye therefore hear them not, because ye are not of God.

verses.name: John 8:48
verses.text: Then answered the Jews, and said unto him, Say we not well that thou art a Samaritan, and hast a devil?

verses.name: John 8:49
verses.text: Jesus answered, I have not a devil; but I honour my Father, and ye do dishonour me.

verses.name: John 8:50
verses.text: And I seek not mine own glory: there is one that seeketh and judgeth.

verses.name: John 8:51
verses.text: Verily, verily, I say unto you, If a man keep my saying, he shall never see death.
